scenes.background: (Bob) throws his hands up in frustration. (Monica) looks at you expectantly.
scenes.description: ‘How are we supposed to prioritize when everything is urgent?’

options.text: We can list all tasks and rank them based on immediate impact.
options.analysis: You proposed a methodical approach, showing high perception and empathy, but your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I understand everything feels urgent, but let’s focus on the biggest issues first.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency but emphasized prioritizing the biggest issues, showing strong self-regulation but less empathy.

options.text: Maybe if you managed your time better, everything wouldn’t seem so urgent.
options.analysis: Your response was passive-aggressive, showing low empathy and self-regulation, potentially straining team dynamics.
